scripts.clean:node_modules: rimraf node_modules && rimraf packages/*/node_modules && rimraf examples/*/node_modules && rimraf exploration/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:node_modules:with-cache: npm run clean:node_modules && yarn cache clean
scripts.confirm: npm run rebuild && npm run build:check-types && npm run test && npm run format
scripts.format: npm run format:extensions && npm run format:prettier
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:node_modules && yarn install && yarn run rebuild
scripts.release: echo "======= Lerna Releasing jay =======" && npm run test && lerna publish
scripts.version:packages:patch: wsrun -p 'jay-*' -s -e --report --prefix version patch --deferred && yarn version apply --all
scripts.version:packages:minor: wsrun -p 'jay-*' -s -e --report --prefix version minor --deferred && yarn version apply --all
scripts.version:packages:major: wsrun -p 'jay-*' -s -e --report --prefix version major --deferred && yarn version apply --all
